import React from 'react' import { RaceList } from '../api/raceapi.js' import { ClassList } from '../api/classapi.js' export default class CharSheet extends React.Component { state = { name: '', race: '', class: '' } nameChange = (event) => { this.setState({ name: event.target.value })} render(){ return(
this.setState({ race: race.toString() })} />
) } }
